transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Yeah, Ultra Power Control?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hi sir, very good afternoon. Myself is Reshu. I am calling from IndiaMART Noida office, sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Actually sir, aapka ek feedback aaya tha hamare paas. Aapki baat hui hogi aapke account manager se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Shri Vam se. To aapne unki call feedback pe no share kiya hai sir. To main wahi jaanna chah rahi thi sir, kya problem rahi call pe ya kya issue tha?
Customer: Aapke person ne aapke company ne totally fake hai. Koi matlab nahi banta hai.
Customer: Aapka customer hai na, customer ko aap bewakoof banane ka dhandha kar rahe ho.
Customer: Kya feedback leke koi fayda nahi hai isme.
Executive: Sir, aap issue batayenge to solve bhi karenge.
Customer: Issue matlab kya hai mera? Main teen saal ka mera package hai. Mere ko problem ho raha hai. Dhai saal se complaint kar raha hu ki bhai mere ko ye nahi chahiye. Do saal se complaint kar raha hu ki bhai process mere ko ye jo hai aapka package mere ko nahi chahiye. Uska mere ko refund chahiye. Uske liye maine proof manga tha, wo proof diya. Abhi uske liye kya main abhi chati chich ke dikha du kya?
Customer: Aur to kya batau madam, bolo.
Executive: Sir dekhiye refund ab sir aap bhi jaan rahe ho sir already aapki jo services hai sir paanch saal se hamare saath.
Customer: Madam main already do saal se complaint kar raha hu. Do saal se complaint kar raha hu. Aaj se nahi kar raha hu. Do saal se kareeban 10 to manager change ho gaye mere account ke.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan. Aur sir refund ka reason kya hai aapka? Matlab kyun aap?
Customer: Refund ka reason matlab madam ye jo aapka product hai na wo totally time waste product hai. Jo jo mere ko commitment kiya tha na us hisab se na hi to kaam kiya hai aur jisne bhi mere ko ye project diya tha I think us time pe Imran aur koi Rahul ya to Vivek karke tha. Wo log bhi mera phone nahi utha rahe the. Jabhi maine complaint chalu kiya na us time pe un logo ne bhi complaint phone uthana band kar diya tha. Hmm hmm. Barabar. To matlab ye totally time waste product hai. Customer ko bewakoof banane ka dhandha hai mere hisab se. Barabar aur mera paisa totally isme waste ho gaya hai.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Barabar. 80000 invest karwa ke bola tha ki ye karenge wo karenge wo karenge kuch kiya nahi aur mera ulta paisa leke bhag gayi company. Aur manga main fir se proof manga tha second ya third koi manager aaya tha madam hum log payment return nahi karte hai. Agar main bola sir madam mere paas proof hai ki aap log payment return karte ho. Un logo ko proof bhi diya ki dusri company hai mere wapi mein hi dusra matlab mere friend ka un logo ne payment refund liya hua hai unko problem nahi aa raha hai usko problem aa raha tha.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai hua hoga refund main mana nahi kar rahi hu sir aapki baat.
Customer: Wahi to madam aapki company mein koi person ko kuch malum nahi hai wahi to problem hai har person phone pe phone kiye ja raha hai. Koi person support karne ke liye ready nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho aapne paisa business karne ke liye lagaya tha agar usme return aapko mil jaata hai.
Customer: Paisa to business karne ke liye hi gaya na madam. Paisa business karne ke liye hi lagata hai aadmi. Agar business nahi milega to paisa dal ke ka matlab kya hai? 80000 maine teen saal ke liye dala.
Customer: Barabar.
Customer: Kya 80000.
Executive: Agar return mil jayega to sir aapko to problem nahi hogi na sir. Fir to aap matlab aapko agar man lijiye sir aapne 80000 rupees lagaya uske against mein aapne teen saal ka investment kara aur teen saal mein agar aap apna ROI nikal lete ho sir to fir to aapko.
Customer: Madam ROI meri baat suniye aap ROI ka chhod main wo madam mera bhi wahi kaam hai return of interest nikalne ka hi. But agar teen saal mein aap samjho ki aapko support hi nahi mile shuruat mein jabhi maine package karwaya na.
Customer: Us time pe pehle to mere ko bola ki aapka profile mein ye update hoga wo hoga uske liye maine pehle Imran aur jo bhi mere paas tha Vivek aur Rahul ya to mere ko naam exact nahi malum hai ek to Imran karke tha manager uske alawa uske upar ek tha Vivek ya to Rahul uska naam nahi mere ko exact malum tha. Un logo ne bola tha ki hum aapki profile mein ye edit karenge wo karenge uske liye maine jab chalu karwana chalu kiya na bhai aap profile mera edit kariye mere ko is hisab se karna hai to un logo ne mera phone hi nahi pick kiya. Ek bar phone karke phone hi pick nahi kiya. Then uske baad last teen mahine baad koi naya manager appointment hua uska phone aaya mere samne se. Un logo ko maine bataya ki bhai mere ko aisa aisa profile chalu karna hai. To usne bhi mera baat suna bola theek hai sir main aapko Monday ko ring karta hu uske baad baith ke apun karte hai matlab theek hai chaliye koi nahi. Bola mere paas thoda kaam hai uske hisab se main karte hai. Ji. Then usne bhi phone uthana band kar diya. Fir uske baad chala gaya do mahina aur chala gaya uske baad naya manager aaya. To aise aise karke teen char bar mere paas hua hai. Mere paas bhi madam hum log bhi kaam leke baithe hai. Aisa nahi hai ki 80000 invest kiya to India mart hume dhandha de dega. Hmm hmm hmm. Barabar na. Hum log bhi kaam leke baithe hai. Har har teen mahine char mahine mein naya manager appointment hoga wahi phone karega fir se wahi kahani dohraega sir aapko kya problem hai kyun nahi kar rahe ho. To mere paas bhi itna time nahi rehta na madam har ek aadmi ko har ek bar kahani sunane ka. Aap bhi samjho.
Executive: Sir bilkul aap theek keh rahe ho main ek bhi point se aapke deny nahi kar rahi hu aapki jagah koi bhi hota to wo same cheeze hi bolta. Agar sir dekho agar Imran ne aur aapke us samay mein jo account manager thi wo Sparshi Verma thi unke manager Imran the aur aur Vivek Mishra right? Haan. Hmm. To ye log the aapki jab dealing hui thi us waqt pe ye log nahi aapke saath dealing kar rahi thi. Agar sir aap kehte ho ki kuch product related matlab updation related commitment kiya gaya tha wo fulfill nahi hua hai sir to main sir dekho aapko ye batana chahti hu control panel agar aap abhi matlab abhi chahe to main aapko meri baat suniye meri baat suniye meri baat suniye madam main hai na itna tang aa chuka hu na India mart se mere ko India mart ka naam bolta hai na to bhi gaali dene ko man hota hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of INR 80,000 investment.

- No support after purchasing the subscription.

- Commitment not fulfilled by IndiaMART.

- Multiple account manager changes.



Resolution:

- Executive is listening to the customer's concerns.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, support, commitment
